verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> be the last <S%H314><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jesse <S%H3448><s%> said, <S%H5002><s%> <S%H1732><s%> and the man <S%H1397><s%> who was raised up <S%H6965><s%> on high, <S%H5920><s%> the anointed <S%H4899><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and the sweet <S%H5273><s%> psalmist <S%H2158><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H5002><s%>
The Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> by me, and his word <S%H4405><s%> was in <S%H5921><s%> my tongue. <S%H3956><s%>

The God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> the Rock <S%H6697><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me, He that ruleth over <S%H4910><s%> men <S%H120><s%> must be just, <S%H6662><s%> ruling <S%H4910><s%> in the fear <S%H3374><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

And he shall be as the light <S%H216><s%> of the morning, <S%H1242><s%> when the sun <S%H8121><s%> riseth, <S%H2224><s%> even a morning <S%H1242><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> clouds; <S%H5645><s%> as the tender grass <S%H1877><s%> springing out of the earth <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> by clear shining <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5051><s%> after rain. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4306><s%>

Although <S%H3588><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> God; <S%H410><s%> yet <S%H3588><s%> he hath made <S%H7760><s%> with me an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> ordered <S%H6186><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> things, and sure: <S%H8104><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> this is all <S%H3605><s%> my salvation, <S%H3468><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> my desire, <S%H2656><s%> although <S%H3588><s%> he make it not <S%H3808><s%> to grow. <S%H6779><s%>

But the sons of Belial <S%H1100><s%> shall be all <S%H3605><s%> of them as thorns <S%H6975><s%> thrust away, <S%H5074><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they cannot <S%H3808><s%> be taken <S%H3947><s%> with hands: <S%H3027><s%>

But the man <S%H376><s%> that shall touch <S%H5060><s%> them must be fenced <S%H4390><s%> with iron <S%H1270><s%> and the staff <S%H6086><s%> of a spear; <S%H2595><s%> and they shall be utterly burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> in the same place. <S%H7675><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> be the names <S%H8034><s%> of the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> had: The Tachmonite <S%H8461><s%> that sat <S%H3427><s%> in the seat, <S%H7675><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> among the captains; <S%H7991><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> was Adino <S%H5722><s%> the Eznite: <S%H6112><s%> he lifted up his spear against <S%H5921><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> whom he slew <S%H2491><s%> at one <S%H259><s%> time. <S%H6471><s%>

And after <S%H310><s%> him was Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo <S%H1734><s%> the Ahohite, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H266><s%> one of the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> when they defied <S%H2778><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> that were there <S%H8033><s%> gathered together <S%H622><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were gone away: <S%H5927><s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3588><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> was weary, <S%H3021><s%> and his hand <S%H3027><s%> cleaved <S%H1692><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the sword: <S%H2719><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> wrought <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> victory <S%H8668><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him only <S%H389><s%> to spoil. <S%H6584><s%>

And after <S%H310><s%> him was Shammah <S%H8048><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Agee <S%H89><s%> the Hararite. <S%H2043><s%> And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were gathered together <S%H622><s%> into a troop, <S%H2416><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> a piece <S%H2513><s%> of ground <S%H7704><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of lentils: <S%H5742><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

But he stood <S%H3320><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the ground, <S%H2513><s%> and defended <S%H5337><s%> it, and slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> wrought <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> victory. <S%H8668><s%>

And three <S%H7969><s%> of the thirty <S%H7970><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> went down, <S%H3381><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the harvest time <S%H7105><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the cave <S%H4631><s%> of Adullam: <S%H5725><s%> and the troop <S%H2416><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim. <S%H7497><s%>
And David <S%H1732><s%> was then <S%H227><s%> in a hold, <S%H4686><s%> and the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> was then <S%H227><s%> in Bethlehem. <S%H1035><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> longed, <S%H183><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Oh that one <S%H4310><s%> would give me drink <S%H8248><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the well <S%H4480><s%> <S%H953><s%> of Bethlehem, <S%H1035><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by the gate! <S%H8179><s%>

And the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%> broke through <S%H1234><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and drew <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the well <S%H4480><s%> <S%H953><s%> of Bethlehem, <S%H1035><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was by the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> it, and brought <S%H935><s%> it to <S%H413><s%> David: <S%H1732><s%> nevertheless he would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> thereof, but poured it out <S%H5258><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Be it far <S%H2486><s%> from me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that I should do <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6213><s%> this: <S%H2063><s%> is not this the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> that went <S%H1980><s%> in jeopardy of their lives? <S%H5315><s%> therefore he would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> it. These <S%H428><s%> things did <S%H6213><s%> these three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men. <S%H1368><s%>

And Abishai, <S%H52><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab, <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah, <S%H6870><s%> was chief <S%H7218><s%> among three. <S%H7992><s%> And he <S%H1931><s%> lifted up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H853><s%> his spear <S%H2595><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> and slew <S%H2491><s%> them, and had the name <S%H8034><s%> among three. <S%H7969><s%>

Was he not <S%H3588><s%> most <S%H4480><s%> honorable <S%H3513><s%> of three? <S%H7969><s%> therefore he was <S%H1961><s%> their captain: <S%H8269><s%> howbeit he attained <S%H935><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the first three. <S%H7969><s%>

And Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada, <S%H3077><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a valiant <S%H2428><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> of Kabzeel, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6909><s%> who had done many acts, <S%H7227><s%> <S%H6467><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> lionlike men <S%H739><s%> of Moab: <S%H4124><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> also and slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of a pit <S%H8432><s%> <S%H953><s%> in time <S%H3117><s%> of snow: <S%H7950><s%>

And he <S%H1931><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H376><s%> <S%H4713><s%> a goodly <S%H4758><s%> man: <S%H376><s%> and the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%> had a spear <S%H2595><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%> but he went down <S%H3381><s%> to <S%H413><s%> him with a staff, <S%H7626><s%> and plucked <S%H1497><s%> <S%H853><s%> the spear <S%H2595><s%> out of the Egyptian's hand, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H4713><s%> and slew <S%H5221><s%> him with his own spear. <S%H2595><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> things did <S%H6213><s%> Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada, <S%H3077><s%> and had the name <S%H8034><s%> among three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men. <S%H1368><s%>

He was more honorable <S%H3513><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the thirty, <S%H7970><s%> but he attained <S%H935><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the first three. <S%H7969><s%> And David <S%H1732><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> him over <S%H413><s%> his guard. <S%H4928><s%>
Asahel <S%H6214><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab <S%H3097><s%> was one of the thirty; <S%H7970><s%> Elhanan <S%H445><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo <S%H1734><s%> of Bethlehem, <S%H1035><s%>
Shammah <S%H8048><s%> the Harodite, <S%H2733><s%> Elika <S%H470><s%> the Harodite, <S%H2733><s%>
Helez <S%H2503><s%> the Paltite, <S%H6407><s%> Ira <S%H5896><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ikkesh <S%H6142><s%> the Tekoite, <S%H8621><s%>
Abiezer <S%H44><s%> the Anethothite, <S%H6069><s%> Mebunnai <S%H4012><s%> the Hushathite, <S%H2843><s%>
Zalmon <S%H6756><s%> the Ahohite, <S%H266><s%> Maharai <S%H4121><s%> the Netophathite, <S%H5200><s%>

Heleb <S%H2460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baanah, <S%H1196><s%> a Netophathite, <S%H5200><s%> Ittai <S%H863><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ribai <S%H7380><s%> out of Gibeah <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1390><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%>
Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the Pirathonite, <S%H6553><s%> Hiddai <S%H1914><s%> of the brooks <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5158><s%> of Gaash, <S%H1608><s%>
Abi-albon <S%H45><s%> the Arbathite, <S%H6164><s%> Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%> the Barhumite, <S%H1273><s%>
Eliahba <S%H455><s%> the Shaalbonite, <S%H8170><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jashen, <S%H3464><s%> Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%>
Shammah <S%H8048><s%> the Hararite, <S%H2043><s%> Ahiam <S%H279><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Sharar <S%H8325><s%> the Hararite, <S%H2043><s%>

Eliphelet <S%H467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahasbai, <S%H308><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of the Maachathite, <S%H4602><s%> Eliam <S%H463><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahithophel <S%H302><s%> the Gilonite, <S%H1526><s%>
Hezrai <S%H2695><s%> the Carmelite, <S%H3761><s%> Paarai <S%H6474><s%> the Arbite, <S%H701><s%>
Igal <S%H3008><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nathan <S%H5416><s%> of Zobah, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6678><s%> Bani <S%H1137><s%> the Gadite, <S%H1425><s%>

Zelek <S%H6768><s%> the Ammonite, <S%H5984><s%> Naharai <S%H5171><s%> the Beerothite, <S%H886><s%> armorbearer <S%H3627><s%> <S%H5375><s%> to Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah, <S%H6870><s%>
Ira <S%H5896><s%> an Ithrite, <S%H3505><s%> Gareb <S%H1619><s%> an Ithrite, <S%H3505><s%>
Uriah <S%H223><s%> the Hittite: <S%H2850><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> in all. <S%H3605><s%>
